          <title>
            <string language="en">Composing Crossword</string>
            <string language="es">Composición de un crucigrama</string>
            <string language="ga">Crosfhocal a Chumadh</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bestehendes Kreuzworträtsel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mots croisé Composants</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Crossword Compondo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Parole incrociate Componenti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σύνθεση του σταυρόλεξου</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Interactive short crossword on organisation for writing and  key terms used in writing.</string>
            <string language="es">Crucigrama corto interactivo sobre la organización para escribir y usar términos claves en la escritura.</string>
            <string language="ga">Crosfhocal gearr idirghníomhach ar eagrú do scríbhneoireacht agus príomhthéarmaí a úsáidtear i scríbhneoireacht.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">English</string>
            <string language="es">Inglés. Composición. Páginas web relevantes</string>
            <string language="ga">Béarla</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Composing</string>
            <string language="ga">Cumadóireacht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Relevant Websites</string>
            <string language="ga">Láithreáin Ghréasáin Bhainteacha</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Interaktives kurzes Kreuzworträtsel auf 
Organisation für das Schreiben und Schlüsselbegriffe verwendet im 
Schreiben.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mots croisé courts interactifs sur l'organisation
pour l'écriture et les termes principaux utilisés dans l'écriture.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Crossword curto interativo na organização para a
escrita e os termos chaves usados na escrita.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Parole incrociate corte interattive 
sull'organizzazione per scrittura ed i termini chiave usati nella 
scrittura.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το διαλογικό σύντομο σταυρόλεξο στην οργάνωση για το 
γράψιμο και οι βασικοί όροι χρησιμοποίησαν εγγράφως να γράψουν.</string>
          </description>
